verses.verse: Behold, <S%H2005><s%> a king <S%H4428><s%> shall reign <S%H4427><s%> in righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and princes <S%H8269><s%> shall rule <S%H8323><s%> in judgment. <S%H4941><s%>

And a man <S%H376><s%> shall be as an hiding <S%H4224><s%> place from the wind, <S%H7307><s%> and a covert <S%H5643><s%> from the tempest; <S%H2230><s%> as rivers <S%H6388><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> in a dry <S%H6724><s%> place, as the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of a great <S%H3515><s%> rock <S%H5553><s%> in a weary <S%H5889><s%> land. <S%H776><s%>
And the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of them that see <S%H7200><s%> shall not be dim, <S%H8159><s%> and the ears <S%H241><s%> of them that hear <S%H8085><s%> shall listen. <S%H7181><s%>

The heart <S%H3824><s%> also of the rash <S%H4116><s%> shall understand <S%H995><s%> knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> and the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the stammerers <S%H5926><s%> shall be ready <S%H4116><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> plainly. <S%H6703><s%>

The vile <S%H5036><s%> person shall be no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> liberal, <S%H5081><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> the churl <S%H3596><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to be bountiful. <S%H7771><s%>

For the vile <S%H5036><s%> person will speak <S%H1696><s%> villainy, <S%H5039><s%> and his heart <S%H3820><s%> will work <S%H6213><s%> iniquity, <S%H205><s%> to practice <S%H6213><s%> hypocrisy, <S%H2612><s%> and to utter <S%H1696><s%> error <S%H8442><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to make empty <S%H7324><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%> of the hungry, <S%H7456><s%> and he will cause the drink <S%H4945><s%> of the thirsty <S%H6771><s%> to fail. <S%H2637><s%>

The instruments <S%H3627><s%> also of the churl <S%H3596><s%> are evil: <S%H7451><s%> he devises <S%H3289><s%> wicked <S%H2154><s%> devices <S%H2154><s%> to destroy <S%H2254><s%> the poor <S%H6035><s%> <S%H6041><s%> with lying <S%H8267><s%> words, <S%H561><s%> even when the needy <S%H34><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> right. <S%H4941><s%>
But the liberal <S%H5081><s%> devises <S%H3289><s%> liberal <S%H5081><s%> things; and by liberal <S%H5081><s%> things shall he stand. <S%H6965><s%>

Rise <S%H6965><s%> up, you women <S%H802><s%> that are at ease; <S%H7600><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> my voice, <S%H6963><s%> you careless <S%H982><s%> daughters; <S%H1323><s%> give ear <S%H238><s%> to my speech. <S%H565><s%>

Many days <S%H3117><s%> and years <S%H8141><s%> shall you be troubled, <S%H7264><s%> you careless <S%H982><s%> women: for the vintage <S%H1210><s%> shall fail, <S%H3615><s%> the gathering <S%H625><s%> shall not come. <S%H935><s%>

Tremble, <S%H2729><s%> you women that are at ease; <S%H7600><s%> be troubled, <S%H7264><s%> you careless <S%H982><s%> ones: strip <S%H6584><s%> you, and make you bore, <S%H6209><s%> and gird <S%H2290><s%> sackcloth on your loins. <S%H2504><s%>
They shall lament <S%H5594><s%> for the teats, <S%H7699><s%> for the pleasant <S%H2531><s%> fields, <S%H7704><s%> for the fruitful <S%H6509><s%> vine. <S%H1612><s%>

On the land <S%H127><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> shall come <S%H5927><s%> up thorns <S%H6975><s%> and briers; <S%H8068><s%> yes, <S%H3588><s%> on all <S%H3605><s%> the houses <S%H1004><s%> of joy <S%H4885><s%> in the joyous <S%H5947><s%> city: <S%H7151><s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> the palaces <S%H759><s%> shall be forsaken; <S%H5203><s%> the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be left; <S%H5800><s%> the forts <S%H6076><s%> and towers <S%H975><s%> shall be for dens <S%H4631><s%> for ever, <S%H5769><s%> a joy <S%H4885><s%> of wild <S%H6501><s%> asses, <S%H6501><s%> a pasture <S%H4829><s%> of flocks; <S%H5739><s%>

Until <S%H5704><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> be poured <S%H6168><s%> on us from on high, <S%H4791><s%> and the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> be a fruitful <S%H3759><s%> field, and the fruitful <S%H3759><s%> field be counted <S%H2803><s%> for a forest. <S%H3293><s%>
Then judgment <S%H4941><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and righteousness <S%H6666><s%> remain <S%H3427><s%> in the fruitful <S%H3759><s%> field.

And the work <S%H4639><s%> of righteousness <S%H6666><s%> shall be peace; <S%H7965><s%> and the effect <S%H5656><s%> of righteousness <S%H6666><s%> quietness <S%H8252><s%> and assurance <S%H983><s%> for ever. <S%H5769><s%>

And my people <S%H5971><s%> shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in a peaceable <S%H7965><s%> habitation, <S%H5116><s%> and in sure <S%H4009><s%> dwellings, <S%H4908><s%> and in quiet <S%H7600><s%> resting <S%H4496><s%> places;
When it shall hail, <S%H1258><s%> coming <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> on the forest; <S%H3293><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be low <S%H8213><s%> in a low <S%H8219><s%> place.

Blessed <S%H835><s%> are you that sow <S%H2232><s%> beside <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> waters, <S%H4325><s%> that send <S%H7971><s%> forth thither the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the ox <S%H7794><s%> and the ass. <S%H2543><s%>
